entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023
